title: Perturbative Renormalizations of Anyon Quantum Mechanics
abstract: In bosonic end perturbative calculations for quantum mechanical anyon systems a regularization and renormalization procedure, analogous to those used in field theory, is necessary. I examine the reliability and the physical interpretation of the most commonly used bosonic end regularization procedures. I then use the regularization procedure with the most transparent physical interpretation to derive some bosonic end perturbation theory results on anyon spectra, including a 3-anyon ground state energy.
